bannerCuts.groupName: Specialty, Role, Volume, Tiers, Segments, Priority Accounts

columns.name: Cards
columns.reason: Both S2 and S2a exist in the data map; direct mapping with AND logic yields high confidence.

columns.name: PCPs
columns.reason: S2 exists with value 2=Internal Medicine/GP/PCP; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Nephs
columns.reason: S2 exists with value 3=Nephrologist; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Endos
columns.reason: S2 exists with value 4=Endocrinologist; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Lipids
columns.reason: S2 exists with value 5=Lipidologist; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: HCP
columns.reason: Conceptual mapping: HCP interpreted as physicians (S2b=1); data map S2b defines primary role=1 as Physician.

columns.name: NP/PA
columns.reason: Conceptual mapping: NP/PA interpreted from S2b values 2=Nurse Practitioner and 3=Physician's Assistant.

columns.name: Higher
columns.reason: Original instruction lacked a numeric cutoff; placeholder uses S10 (patient volume) but requires manual specification of 'cutoff' value.

columns.name: Lower
columns.reason: Original instruction lacked a numeric cutoff; placeholder uses S10 (patient volume) but requires manual specification of 'cutoff' value.

columns.name: Tier 1
columns.reason: qLIST_TIER exists with value 1=TIER 1; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Tier 2
columns.reason: qLIST_TIER exists with value 2=TIER 2; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Tier 3
columns.reason: qLIST_TIER exists with value 3=TIER 3; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Tier 4
columns.reason: qLIST_TIER exists with value 4=TIER 4; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Segment A
columns.reason: Data map contains 'Segment' but no defined answer options; placeholder matches text 'A', manual review required.

columns.name: Segment B
columns.reason: Data map contains 'Segment' but no defined answer options; placeholder matches text 'B', manual review required.

columns.name: Segment C
columns.reason: Data map contains 'Segment' but no defined answer options; placeholder matches text 'C', manual review required.

columns.name: Segment D
columns.reason: Data map contains 'Segment' but no defined answer options; placeholder matches text 'D', manual review required.

columns.name: Priority Account
columns.reason: qLIST_PRIORITY_ACCOUNT exists with value 1=PRIORITY; direct equality mapping.

columns.name: Non-Priority Account
columns.reason: qLIST_PRIORITY_ACCOUNT exists with value 2=NOT PRIORITY; direct equality mapping.
